channel.title: Collected Comics Library
channel.description: Collected Comics Library, hosted by Chris Marshall, from Detroit, Michigan. USA, THE Comic Book and Trade Paperback Podcast. The only podcast solely dedicated to news, information and reviews on all sorts of comic books and collected editions including DC Comics Archives, Marvel Masterworks, Absolutes, Omnibus's, Graphic Novels and all other hardcover and softcover favorites - the CCL covers it all!
channel.copyright: Copyright Chris Marshall and Collected Comics Library 1999-2011
channel.itunes:summary: Collected Comics Library, hosted by Chris Marshall, from Detroit, Michigan. USA, THE Comic Book and Trade Paperback Podcast. The only podcast solely dedicated to news, information and reviews on all sorts of comic books and collected editions including DC Comics Archives, Marvel Masterworks, Absolutes, Omnibus's, Graphic Novels and all other hardcover and softcover favorites - the CCL covers it all!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Podcast thats all about Comic Books in Trade Paperback and Collected Edition form.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Marshall
channel.itunes:keywords: comic books, podcast, arts, visual arts, literature, collected comics library, marvel, dc comics, book, comics, books, collected, edition, collected editions, graphic novel, trade, trade paperbacks, hardcover
